ComicInfo.Summary:
With the exception of Disaster 1990, all stories come to an end this prog to make way for the merger of 2000AD and Tornado next week. Dan Dare ends on a cliffhanger, which has never been resolved as DD was relaunched in the new Eagle a few years later.
Cover: Disaster 1990 (art: unknown)
Judge Dredd - The Guinea Pig that Changed the Law (John Wagner - John Cooper)Disaster 1990 (part 8) (Gerry Finley-Day - Alan Willow)ABC Warriors - General Blackblood (part 2 - final part) (Pat Mills - Mike McMahon)Project Overkill (part 8 - final part) (Kelvin Gosnell - Jesus Redondo)Dan Dare - Servant of Evil! (part 26 - final part) (Tom Tully - Dave Gibbons)
